mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT s.* FROM storeview s JOIN menu m ON s.sno = m.sno
AND m.mncate = #{mncate}
ORDER BY s.average_rating DESC
ORDER BY s.review_count DESC
ORDER BY s.sno
SELECT sno, store_name, store_image, average_rating, review_count FROM storeview WHERE sno = #{sno}
SELECT mnno, mnname, mnprice, mnimg, mnside FROM menu WHERE sno =#{sno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (mno, mnno, camount, ctotal) VALUES((select mno from member where mid = #{mid}), #{mnno}, #{camount}, #{ctotal})
